snippet.title: Swift 4.2 Draw Something Undo / Clear with OOP Principles (Ep 2)
snippet.description:
This lesson will go through the implementation of the Undo and Clear buttons using a UIStackView component.  This helps lay out things very easily in a horizontal fashion.  In the end we'll dig into OOP and encapsulation to improve our apps.

Tinder Firestore Swipe and Match
